ModMetaData.name: Hospitality 1.06b
ModMetaData.author: Orion
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to recruit visitors and passing friendlies, at a price, of course.
You can also improve your relationship with visiting factions.
Changes by Leucetius: - no more error when recruiting someone with a leaderless faction. - guests may become tired of talking with you ;) - changed relationship impacts
